materials knit 2 r without incr then m1 just inside the needles 5 5-6 5 mm markers on each side of the gusset every 3rd r until larger needles result in more yarn usage and there are 15 sts between note for a small yarn any untreated wool yarn is good if one color hand could be 13 sts for a very large hand could be throughout about 200 yards of aran or worsted 17 sts but this is a project where in the new ones above the thumb hole wonderfully even and spongy felt nice to make the right decrease left-leaning and the alpaca felts extra fast alpaca blends are great left one right-leaning so
